title: Beirut's Deadly Port Explosion, One Year Later
description: It's been exactly one year since a massive explosion in Beirut's port killed over 200 people, injured thousands and caused billions of dollars in damage.
copyright: Copyright 2020-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Beirut's Deadly Port Explosion, One Year Later
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: One year after a deadly explosion in Lebanon's capital city, those who survived are still waiting for justice.
itunes:subtitle: One year after a deadly explosion in Lebanon's capital city, those who survived are still waiting for justice.
content:encoded: It's been exactly one year since a massive explosion in Beirut's port killed over 200 people, injured thousands and caused billions of dollars in damage.
